text: Futhi ukube wonke umuntu owayenza ububi wayezothatha konke okusemhlabeni ukukhokhela izenzo zabo kwakungeke kwamukelwe ngakho futhi babeyokufihla ukudumala kwabo, kepha kuyothi lapho sebesibona isijeziso kuyohlulelwa phakathi kwabo ngobulungiswa futhi bona angeke benziwe okungesibona ubulungiswa
